pr_title: Fix bug where fvh fragments could be loaded from wrong doc

timeline.bodyText: This is hacky but felt like the best way to fix this right now. FragmentsBuilder is an external (Lucene) interface and there's not a good way to pass in _source to its methods like getFields.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Could we replace the cached FragmentsBuilder with a Function<SourceLookup, FragmentsBuilder> and then call that with the new SourceLookup for each hit?  The FragmentsBuilders themselves don't seem to do any significant processing on construction so I don't think there would be a performance penalty for rebuilding them each time.
replies.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: It seems like that should work! I'd like to check I understand the context. We have these cached entries not because fragment builders are expensive to build, but to avoid rebuilding the FieldQuery which looks more complex?
replies.author: jtibshirani
